languages.text: В нос бьет кислый запах прелого мяса и ржавчины — обезглавленные тела сервиторов начали разлагаться. На гниющей плоти угадываются рваные раны, а аугментации подплавлены какой-то едкой субстанцией.

The sour smell of putrid meat and rust hits your senses — the beheaded bodies of the servitors have begun to decompose. You can make out lacerations on their rotting flesh, and their augmetics have been partially melted by some caustic substance.
languages.original_text: В нос бьет кислый запах прелого мяса и ржавчины — обезглавленные тела сервиторов начали разлагаться. На гниющей плоти угадываются рваные раны, а аугментации подплавлены какой-то едкой субстанцией.

traits.locale_text: The sour smell of putrid meat and rust hits your senses — the beheaded bodies of the servitors have begun to decompose. You can make out lacerations on their rotting flesh, and their augmetics have been partially melted by some caustic substance.

The sour smell of putrid meat and rust hits your senses — the beheaded bodies of the servitors have begun to decompose. You can make out lacerations on their rotting flesh, and their augmetics have been partially melted by some caustic substance.

languages.text: Der saure Gestank von verfaultem Fleisch und Rost steigt dir in die Nase ... die enthaupteten Leiber der Servitoren verwesen bereits. Du erkennst Wunden in ihrem verrottendem Fleisch, und ihre Augmentationen wurden von einer säurehaltigen Substanz teilweise geschmolzen.
languages.original_text: The sour smell of putrid meat and rust hits your senses — the beheaded bodies of the servitors have begun to decompose. You can make out lacerations on their rotting flesh, and their augmetics have been partially melted by some caustic substance.

traits.locale_text: Der saure Gestank von verfaultem Fleisch und Rost steigt dir in die Nase ... die enthaupteten Leiber der Servitoren verwesen bereits. Du erkennst Wunden in ihrem verrottendem Fleisch, und ihre Augmentationen wurden von einer säurehaltigen Substanz teilweise geschmolzen.

languages.text: L'odeur aigre de la rouille mêlée à celle de la viande putride vous agresse les sens ; les servitors décapités ont semble-t-il commencé à se décomposer. Sur leur chair, vous distinguez des traces de lacérations, tandis que leurs augmétiques semblent avoir été partiellement fondus par une substance caustique.
languages.original_text: The sour smell of putrid meat and rust hits your senses — the beheaded bodies of the servitors have begun to decompose. You can make out lacerations on their rotting flesh, and their augmetics have been partially melted by some caustic substance.

traits.locale_text: L'odeur aigre de la rouille mêlée à celle de la viande putride vous agresse les sens ; les servitors décapités ont semble-t-il commencé à se décomposer. Sur leur chair, vous distinguez des traces de lacérations, tandis que leurs augmétiques semblent avoir été partiellement fondus par une substance caustique.

languages.text: El olor agrio de la carne podrida y el óxido asaltan tus sentidos: los cadáveres decapitados de los servidores han empezado a descomponerse. Puedes distinguir laceraciones en la carne putrefacta, y ves que los auméticos han sido corroídos parcialmente por alguna sustancia cáustica.
languages.original_text: The sour smell of putrid meat and rust hits your senses — the beheaded bodies of the servitors have begun to decompose. You can make out lacerations on their rotting flesh, and their augmetics have been partially melted by some caustic substance.

traits.locale_text: El olor agrio de la carne podrida y el óxido asaltan tus sentidos: los cadáveres decapitados de los servidores han empezado a descomponerse. Puedes distinguir laceraciones en la carne putrefacta, y ves que los auméticos han sido corroídos parcialmente por alguna sustancia cáustica.

languages.text: 腐敗した肉と錆の酸っぱい臭いがあなたの感覚を襲う。斬首されたサーヴィターの死体は腐敗し始めている。腐った肉には裂傷があり、オーグメティックの一部が苛性物質で溶けていることがわかる。
languages.original_text: The sour smell of putrid meat and rust hits your senses — the beheaded bodies of the servitors have begun to decompose. You can make out lacerations on their rotting flesh, and their augmetics have been partially melted by some caustic substance.

traits.locale_text: 腐敗した肉と錆の酸っぱい臭いがあなたの感覚を襲う。斬首されたサーヴィターの死体は腐敗し始めている。腐った肉には裂傷があり、オーグメティックの一部が苛性物質で溶けていることがわかる。

languages.text: 腐肉的臭味与铁锈的酸味冲击着你的嗅觉，那些机仆被斩首的尸体已经开始腐烂。你在他们腐烂的肉体上辨认出了撕裂的痕迹，他们身上的植入物被某种腐蚀性的物质融化了。
languages.original_text: The sour smell of putrid meat and rust hits your senses — the beheaded bodies of the servitors have begun to decompose. You can make out lacerations on their rotting flesh, and their augmetics have been partially melted by some caustic substance.

traits.locale_text: 腐肉的臭味与铁锈的酸味冲击着你的嗅觉，那些机仆被斩首的尸体已经开始腐烂。你在他们腐烂的肉体上辨认出了撕裂的痕迹，他们身上的植入物被某种腐蚀性的物质融化了。

languages.text: Çürümüş et ve pas kokusu, duyularına hücum ediyor. Hizmetörlerin kafaları kesilmiş bedenleri çözülmeye başlamış. Çürüyen vücutlardaki yara izlerini ve yakıcı bir madde ile kısmen erimiş ogmetikleri görebiliyorsun.
languages.original_text: The sour smell of putrid meat and rust hits your senses — the beheaded bodies of the servitors have begun to decompose. You can make out lacerations on their rotting flesh, and their augmetics have been partially melted by some caustic substance.
